projectLinks.title: Search Products
projectLinks.description: During my time at Cirrus10, I built an internal search UI using React, Bootstrap and less. The app works in conjunction with their API, but I built a Node API for testing purposes. I also created containers using Docker

projectLinks.title: ToDo List with React.js
projectLinks.description: Fully functional CRUD ToDo App with React.js on the Front End and MongoDB, and Express on the Back End

projectLinks.title: IMDB Clone
projectLinks.description: Rails CRUD application, it uses Devise for authentication, Faker for seeding, and paperclip for images. It uses a jQuery plugin called jquery.raty to transform a number into stars rating. It uses PostGreSQL for DB

projectLinks.title: BookFinder
projectLinks.description: Simple app to find books. Using React, React-Bootstrap, Axios, Google Books API, and deployed to Heroku

projectLinks.title: Galactic Age Converter
projectLinks.description: Galactic age converter, allows you to enter filters and get your age in different planets. used ES6, jQuery, Materialize, Moment.js, Gulp, Browserify, bower, Karma and Jasmine for testing

projectLinks.title: Jule's Pizza Place
projectLinks.description: Built with Angular and Angular Material in the front end, and using Firebase in the backend.

projectLinks.title: The Vinyl Vault
projectLinks.description: Simple JavaScript cart application., using HTML, CSS and JavaScript
